body: At 12th level, whenever the synthesist is fused with his eidolon, he gains a +4 shield bonus to his Armor Class and a +4 circumstance bonus on his saving throws. This ability replaces greater shield ally.
name: Greater Shielded Meld
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Summoner Archetypes/Synthesist/Greater Shielded Meld
